itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by podcaster Ryan Michler to discuss his podcast ‘Order of Man’, what his life is like living in Maine, the problem with the self-help space on the internet, how people are only being taught to be angry by the m...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by podcaster Ryan Michler to discuss his podcast ‘Order of Man’, what his life is like living in Maine, the problem with the self-help space on the internet, how people are only being taught to be angry by the media, and what sorts of education could help lift people out of poverty.
